orig_text:
[RFC3889]    Barbir, A., Murphy, S., and Y. Yang, "Generic Threats to
                Routing Protocols", RFC 3889, October 2004.
correct_text:
[RFC4593]    Barbir, A., Murphy, S., and Y. Yang, "Generic Threats to
                Routing Protocols", RFC 4593, October 2006.
notes: Although the cited document appears to have reached the AUTH48 stage in 2004 and was provisionally assigned an RFC number of 3889, it was withdrawn for further editing and was never actually published under that number. Its eventual publication in 2006 was under the RFC number 4593.
